deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: Contract to control the release of PARTY.

Enable distribution. A sufficient amount of PARTY >= startingBalance must be transferred
 to the contract before enabling. The recipient must also be set. Can only be called by
 the owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address"

arguments.value: TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address"

documentation.text:
Sets the recipient of the vested distributions. In the initial Pangolin scheme, this
 should be the address of the LiquidityPoolManager. Can only be called by the contract
 owner.

Vest the next PARTY allocation. Requires vestingCliff seconds in between calls. PARTY will
 be distributed to the recipient.
Contract to control the release of PARTY.

Enable distribution. A sufficient amount of PARTY >= startingBalance must be transferred
 to the contract before enabling. The recipient must also be set. Can only be called by
 the owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address"

arguments.value: TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TreasuryVester::setRecipient: Recipient can't be the zero address"

documentation.text:
Sets the recipient of the vested distributions. In the initial Pangolin scheme, this
 should be the address of the LiquidityPoolManager. Can only be called by the contract
 owner.

Vest the next PARTY allocation. Requires vestingCliff seconds in between calls. PARTY will
 be distributed to the recipient.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claim().notice: Vest the next PARTY allocation. Requires vestingCliff seconds in between calls. PARTY will be distributed to the recipient.

setRecipient(address).notice: Sets the recipient of the vested distributions. In the initial Pangolin scheme, this should be the address of the LiquidityPoolManager. Can only be called by the contract owner.

startVesting().notice: Enable distribution. A sufficient amount of PARTY >= startingBalance must be transferred to the contract before enabling. The recipient must also be set. Can only be called by the owner.

userdoc.notice: Contract to control the release of PARTY.
